results.content: Esperava um curso realmente avançado, o instrutor tem claros vícios de código e más práticas principalmente à legibilidade de código. Esperava receber um curso sobre a linguagem em si, mas a maior parte do tempo são ensinadas implementações de algoritmos.
results.content_html: Esperava um curso realmente avançado, o instrutor tem claros vícios de código e más práticas principalmente à legibilidade de código. Esperava receber um curso sobre a linguagem em si, mas a maior parte do tempo são ensinadas implementações de algoritmos.

results.content: great lectures, I'm not a fan of 'building' a site rather than learning concepts and understanding in-depth. Just the same this teaches well, you will understand what is being taught. DO NOT expect any replies worth anything to your questions.
results.content_html: great lectures, I'm not a fan of 'building' a site rather than learning concepts and understanding in-depth. Just the same this teaches well, you will understand what is being taught. DO NOT expect any replies worth anything to your questions.

results.content: This course is stellar! There is nothing worse then people designing courses and putting expert or advanced and it is NOT. THIS IS!! It is so organized and detailed. The teacher is awesome.
results.content_html: This course is stellar! There is nothing worse then people designing courses and putting expert or advanced and it is NOT. THIS IS!! It is so organized and detailed. The teacher is awesome.

results.content: Excellent discussion and practical application of design patterns in the JavaScript library.
results.content_html: Excellent discussion and practical application of design patterns in the JavaScript library.

results.content: I am fairly new to JS still and I took this course as a way to further my education on the subject.  Some of it went way over my head, but I was able to see where I need to focus my energy to bring myself up to speed.  The course was pretty good - it could be because I have less knowledge on the subject than the intended audience, but it went a little fast in some places.  I would have liked a little more explanation.  There really aren't many discussions on the boards, which was also put me off a bit as I tend to turn there first for clarification or explanations from others in the class.  Overall, good course!
results.content_html: I am fairly new to JS still and I took this course as a way to further my education on the subject. Some of it went way over my head, but I was able to see where I need to focus my energy to bring myself up to speed. The course was pretty good - it could be because I have less knowledge on the subject than the intended audience, but it went a little fast in some places. I would have liked a little more explanation. There really aren't many discussions on the boards, which was also put me off a bit as I tend to turn there first for clarification or explanations from others in the class. Overall, good course!

results.content: Course looks good, but the lector speaks very quickly

results.content: I really thought I would learn more from this tutorial, but was disappointed.  It was not for me.  I did however like the way he took the time to explain things.  For me this was an ok find.
